# Hangman [(by TerrierDarts)](https://www.twitch.tv/TerrierDarts)

## Description
With this extension you will be able to run an games of hangman, you can guess letters or go for gold and guess the whole word. This is set up so it can be ran in several languages, English, German, Italian and Chinese.
> Chinese has not be tested. However all others should work fine, if you do run into issues post in the Extensions Discord. (Link can be found on home page) {.is-info}
## Import Code and Codepen
```

```
https://codepen.io/terrierdarts/pen/qBpQExw Here is the Pen, its not necessary but its here if you want it.

## Set Up
### OBS Setup (Optional)
If you want, you can use the the codepen to show the game on screen. I've provided the codepen link so if you wish to make any styling adjustments you can. The best way to do this is to `Fork` the pen and then make edits. Once you've got it looking the way you wish you can `Export` once its downloaded extract the folder into somewhere safe. Then you will need to go into the dist folder and open the index.html. You will need to copy the url and then create a browser source in OBS with that url. It should look something like this.
![hangmanobs.png](/extensions/hangman/images/hangmanobs.png)
> Its important you dont use `Local File` in OBS. {.is-warning}
### Streamerbot Setup
After you've imported the code you will need to decide how you wish to trigger this, I personally chose `Channel Point Redeems` but `Chat Commands` can be use. You will need to set up 3 triggers, `Start Game`, `Guess Letter` and a `Guess Word`. If you use Channel Points The Guess Redeems will require input.
